commit_title: Avoid redundant store updates; refactor trace config
commit_message: PlotArea: avoid unnecessary setFilteredStats and setActiveTraces calls by comparing JSON.stringify(stats|generatedTraces) against refs before updating store. ControllerButtons: add an explicit cast when reading layout.title text ((layout as any).title?.text) to satisfy typing. TraceConfig: switch trace iteration from sideMenuData.yAxis to activeTraces and introduce distinct per-trace (exact) vs per-column customizations; resolve displayName (exact > column+group > default), compute effective color/mode/symbol, update control ids/names/handlers to use trace.fullTraceName, consider column-level fallbacks for symbol/size, and pass correct col/custom to HistogramBinSettings. These changes reduce redundant renders and improve trace customization correctness.
